thread.title: Indonesia fights toxic waste in a vital river

title: Indonesia fights toxic waste in a vital river
text:
Indonesia fights toxic waste in a vital river 11:11am GMT - 01:45 
A massive seven-year cleaning operation is underway to clean up a trash-strewn Indonesian river which is known to be one of the world's most polluted rivers. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A massive seven-year cleaning operation is underway to clean up a trash-strewn Indonesian river which is known to be one of the world's most polluted rivers. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2HUMXuW
